import { useState } from 'react'; import OrderShowBarStyle from '../Style/OrderShowBar.module.css' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import BurstingBlueberry from '../Pic/CoffeeListPic/BurstingBlueberry.png' import CinnamonAndCocoa from '../Pic/CoffeeListPic/CinnamonAndCocoa.png' import CocoVanillaCream from '../Pic/CoffeeListPic/Coco&VanillaCream.png' import DalgonaMacha from '../Pic/CoffeeListPic/DalgonaMacha.png' import DrizzledWithCaramel from '../Pic/CoffeeListPic/DrizzledWithCaramel.png' import WhippedChocolate from '../Pic/CoffeeListPic/WhippedChocolate.png' function OrderShowBar() { const [showTrue, setShowTrue] = useState(false) const { coffeeOrder } = useSelector(state => state.foods) console.log(coffeeOrder); const orderPrice = coffeeOrder.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price, 0) const [pic,setPic] = useState(BurstingBlueberry) return ( <>
setShowTrue(!showTrue)}>
ORDER STATUS
2
{showTrue ?

setShowTrue(!showTrue)}>HIDE ->

  • Ordered

    • JUST NOW

    {coffeeOrder.map((item, index) => { switch (item.name) { case 'Bursting Blueberry': setPic(BurstingBlueberry) break; case 'Cinnamon And Cocoa': setPic(CinnamonAndCocoa) break; case 'Coco & Vanilla Cream': setPic(CocoVanillaCream) break; case 'Dalgona Macha': setPic(DalgonaMacha) break; case 'Drizzled With Caramel': setPic(DrizzledWithCaramel) break; case 'Whipped Chocolate': setPic(WhippedChocolate) break; default: pic = WhippedChocolate break; } return (

    {item.name}

    {item.num}

    ) }) }

    : ''} ) } export default OrderShowBar;
